content.question: Write a thesis statement that you would use for an essay that analyzes how Kincaid uses literary elements and techniques to develop the conflict that arises from the complex interaction of Lucy and Mariah’s different values. Beneath your thesis statement, write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

frqParts.text: Write a thesis statement that you would use for an essay that analyzes how Kincaid uses literary elements and techniques to develop the conflict that arises from the complex interaction of Lucy and Mariah’s different values. Beneath your thesis statement, write a paragraph in support of your thesis that uses at least one piece of evidence from the text.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
